name: ModifySessionRecordingPlaylist
description:
Update session recording playlists for a project.

Use this tool to update existing session recording playlists within a specified project. This is typically used when changes to playlist details are needed.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Retrieve the ID by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: playlist_short_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the session recording playlist to be updated. It is used to specify the exact playlist within the project.

parameters.name: session_recording_playlist_data
parameters.description: Provide the session recording playlist details as a JSON object for updating. Include fields such as 'id', 'short_id', 'name', 'description', and more as needed.

is_synthetic.description: Return whether this is a synthetic playlist

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

is_synthetic.description: Return whether this is a synthetic playlist
